title: Introduction to Algebra
description: A beginner course that introduces algebraic principles and problem-solving techniques.

title: Science Explorers Club
description: A weekly club that lets students explore basic science through fun experiments.

title: Painting Basics
description: An artistic course focusing on basic painting techniques using various mediums.

title: One-Time Chemistry Lab
description: A single-session lab workshop on chemical reactions and safety.

title: Creative Writing Workshop
description: A course aimed at enhancing creative writing skills in young authors.

title: Robotics Club
description: Students work together to build and program robots using Lego Mindstorms.

title: Intro to Python Programming
description: Learn the basics of programming using Python in this introductory course.

title: World History Overview
description: A brief exploration of world history focusing on key civilizations and events.

title: One-Time Photography Basics
description: A single-session photography class introducing composition and lighting.

title: Mathematics Competition Club
description: A club for students who love solving challenging math problems competitively.

title: Advanced Environmental Science
description: Students dive deep into ecosystems, climate change, and sustainability topics.
